“You’re too slow,” Luke sighed, before picking his uncle up by the armpits and placing him on the changing table “lie down.” Mitchell did as he was told, heart hammering.

With Cameron having left with Lilly to flee back home, and Luke living with Mitchell now since his nephew had a falling out with his family, the dynamic was changed enough without this treatment; but a few misdemeanours from Mitchell resulted in a surprisingly dominant Luke taking responsibility for punishing his uncle in an all too permanently seeming way.

“Sorry you’re a baby girl, but all Lilly’s stuff was here anyway, so it just seemed easier,” Luke said, undressing Mitchell quickly “ok, here comes the diapie, Mitchie!” Mitchell but his lip to prevent a snarky comment coming forward as Luke unfolded a sickeningly pink diaper.

“Butt up,” Luke said, and Mitchell did as he was told “good girl.” The diaper was slid underneath Mitchell, before it was taped up tightly. However, Luke wasn’t done yet; pulling up a pink pacifier and clip, he popped it in Mitchell’s mouth, and clipped it to his shirt. He also pulled out a shirt with the words ‘Princess of the Potty’ covering its chest, and put it on Mitchell.

“Perfect,” Luke said, patting his uncle’s diapered butt “now..”
